# Melon Jupyterlab Theme

[![Github Actions Status](https://github.com/ursulams/jupyterlab_theme_melon/workflows/Build/badge.svg)](https://github.com/ursulams/jupyterlab_theme_melon/blob/main/.github/workflows/build.yml)

A dark theme for Jupyterlab

<img width="1679" height="394" alt="Image" src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8781ca55-3a72-4299-8c4b-6d210c9c6005" />

## Requirements

- JupyterLab \>= 4.0.0

## Install

To install the extension, execute:

```bash
pip install jupyterlab_theme_melon
```

## Uninstall

To remove the extension, execute:

```bash
pip uninstall jupyterlab_theme_melon
```
